name: Counter Critical Attack
description:
Brand New Game from Producers of City Driving and Truck Simulator.
3D First Person Shooter in real-time game.

Counter Critical Attack relaunched for mobile.
Are you ready to play against real player from whole world?

- Multiplayer Online and Wifi
- Worldwide Online Fps Tournament!
- Confrontation Special Forces teams and teams of terrorists
- 100+ Characters per team
- 2 Maps ( Detailed environment )
- 7 Weapons ( Pistols, Shotgun, Submachine guns, Rifles, Sniper, Grenades )
- 2 different camera angles
- Amazing 3D graphics
- More than 15 language support(English,Türkçe,Русский,Espanol,Deutsch,Francais,日本人,中国)

Download Counter Critical Attack game right now for free.

You can reach us for any questions or problems on help@zuuks.com
